benchmark_details.name: NovelQA
benchmark_details.overview: NovelQA is a benchmark crafted to specifically evaluate LLMsâ€™ performance on texts with averaged context windows exceeding 200,000 tokens, constructed from English novels to assess deep textual understanding in LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the long-context comprehension abilities of LLMs using complex narratives from novels.

data.source: 65 free public-domain books from Project Gutenberg and 24 copyright-protected books purchased online.
data.annotation: Annotations performed by expert annotators with detailed, human-crafted questions and corresponding answers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model outputs compared to ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better model performance in understanding and responding to questions based on long textual contexts.
methodology.baseline_results: Human baselines achieved around 90% accuracy in generative settings.
methodology.validation: Evaluated with various long-context LLMs to assess their long-context understanding.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: NovelQA does not contain any personally identifiable information.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: NovelQA is released under the Apache-2.0 License.
